About me.

A sneak peek into my life

So I'm Pyry, a 22 year old student from Lappeenranta, Finland. I'm a second year computer science major and I'm really into tech. I'm always keen to start on new projects and I love solving problems. I have also done sprint hurdles most of my life and I'm in the top 5 hurdlers of Finland. My outlook on life is upbeat and you will rarely catch me stressing about anything.

Studies

Computer science LUT University
